model.employees.drivers

Class DeliveryDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.employees.Employee
      • model.employees.drivers.Driver
        • model.employees.drivers.DeliveryDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DeliveryDriver
extends Driver
    Driver that delivers products to the customers after they're sold. All delivery drivers have cars, and they have to traverse a distance of 3 to deliver a product.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • pickActionHandler

        public void pickActionHandler(ProductTransport productTransport)
        Sets the actionHandler for the delivery driver to be Delivery.
        Specified by:
        pickActionHandler in class Driver
        Parameters:
        productTransport - aggregates all actionHandlers for drivers.

      • send

        public void send(Product product)
        The delivery driver starts the delivery of a product. The delivery driver can only deliver as much product at once as is his cars capacity. Therefore, it will take him longer to deliver a large amount of product.
        Overrides:
        send in class Driver
        Parameters:
        product - the product that the driver started delivering.

      • finish

        protected void finish()
        Finishes one delivery of a product by the delivery driver. The whole delivery request is finished only if the entire requested amount has been delivered.
        Overrides:
        finish in class Driver

      • nextDay

        public void nextDay()
        Advances the day for the delivery driver and his car.
        Overrides:
        nextDay in class Driver

      • nextDelivery

        public void nextDelivery()
        The takes on a new delivery request from the queue.
